publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-208# Michael Russell: Unemployment in North Ayrshire—That the Parliament notes that the September unemployment figures for North Ayrshire confirm its position as the second worst unemployment blackspot in Scotland and seeks the urgent attention of the Scottish Executive, the Scottish Parliament, and North Ayrshire Council to address the human and economic crisis that exists in this part of Scotland. Supported by: Mr Murray Tosh
S1M-208# Unemployment in North Ayrshire (lodged on 15 October 1999) Kay Ullrich*
S1M-208# Unemployment in North Ayrshire (lodged on 15 October 1999) Christine Grahame*

S1M-208# Michael Russell: Unemployment in North Ayrshire—That the Parliament notes that the September unemployment figures for North Ayrshire confirm its position as the second worst unemployment blackspot in Scotland and seeks the urgent attention of the Scottish Executive, the Scottish Parliament, and North Ayrshire Council to address the human and economic crisis that exists in this part of Scotland. Supported by: Mr Murray Tosh, Kay Ullrich, Christine Grahame
S1M-208# Unemployment in North Ayrshire (lodged on 15 October 1999) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-208# Unemployment in North Ayrshire (lodged on 15 October 1999) David Mundell*, Ms Irene Oldfather*

S1M-208# Michael Russell: Unemployment in North Ayrshire—That the Parliament notes that the September unemployment figures for North Ayrshire confirm its position as the second worst unemployment blackspot in Scotland and seeks the urgent attention of the Scottish Executive, the Scottish Parliament, and North Ayrshire Council to address the human and economic crisis that exists in this part of Scotland. Supported by: Mr Murray Tosh, Kay Ullrich, Christine Grahame, Mr Kenneth Gibson, David Mundell, Ms Irene Oldfather, Phil Gallie*
